Grand Total 1,446 100%ADI does not rely on EE0-1 data for our annual report because ADI is a global company and the EE0-1 report only covers our US employees. 
In addition, the band of EE0-1 categories are fixed and very broad in nature, and not reflective of ADI’s complex job structure.
